sentences.sentence: I think eventually that question would gnaw at you and sour and override the pleasure.
sentences.translation: 我想最终这个问题会折磨你，让你失望，让你放弃快乐。

sentences.sentence: It will also gnaw at Mr Summers, who leaves his job of repairing the economy unfinished.
sentences.translation: 它也会折磨萨默斯，因为他的经济修复工作尚未完成。
